gameName: The Outer Worlds: Spacer's Choice Edition
reports_summary: From a single write-up, the game feels steady on the Steam Deck OLED when kept to a 30 FPS cap; using the upscaler at quality and keeping textures and effects high preserved much of the visual detail, occasional frame dips showed up but did not cause stutter, and the report gave performance a positive rating. Stability and frame pacing were described as acceptable for longer sessions on that hardware, with the locked 30 FPS target and the choice of upscaler being the most impactful levers for balancing fidelity and consistency.
